mapper.select: SELECT b_no, b_title, b_writer, b_content, b_regdate, b_readcnt, b_grpno, b_grpord, b_depth, b_category FROM BOARD WHERE b_no=#{b_no}

SELECT b_no, b_title, b_writer, b_content, b_regdate, b_readcnt, b_grpno, b_grpord, b_depth, b_category FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND b_writer LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND b_title LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND b_content LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND b_writer LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR b_title LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR b_content LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY b_no DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
